ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopni.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mopntop | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 3 |  | #P_inopn | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. J /\ B e. J ) -> ( A i^i B ) e. J ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ A e. J /\ B e. J ) -> ( A i^i B ) e. J ) |
